Package Boundary

Class MenuBoundary

Object
Boundary
MenuBoundary
public class MenuBoundary extends Boundary
Is the boundary that is involved with all Menu flows.
Since:
2021-11-11
Version:
0.1.0
Author:
Wong Wei Bin, Ivan Teo, Grace Wong, Goh Xue Zhe, Matthew Chua

  • Method Details

    • printMenu

      public String printMenu​(ArrayList<AlaCarteEntity> items, ArrayList<PackageEntity> packages)
      Transforms an ArrayList of AlaCarteEntity and ArrayList of PackageEntity into a formatted string representing the menu
      Parameters:
      items - is an ArrayList of AlaCarteEntity representing the menu's ala carte items
      packages - is an ArrayList of PackageEntity representing the menu's packages
      Returns:
      a string representing the menu.

    • getUserMenuChoice

      public void getUserMenuChoice​(ArrayList<AlaCarteEntity> items, ArrayList<PackageEntity> packages, ChoiceObserver callback)
      Get User's Choice for what menu component they would like to manage
      Parameters:
      items - is an ArrayList of AlaCarteEntity representing the menu's ala carte items
      packages - is an ArrayList of PackageEntity representing the menu's packages
      callback - is the anonymous callback function to run when user inputs a valid integer

    • printTitle

      public void printTitle​(int choice)
      Print banners for each manage menu choice
      Parameters:
      choice - is an int representing the user's previous choice to which the title will be appropriately printed out

    • getTitle

      private String getTitle​(int choice)
      Get the appropriate title for the current UI flow
      Parameters:
      choice - is an int representing the user's previous choice to which the title will be appropriately printed out
      Returns:
      the string representing the title of the UI that the user is currently viewing

    • getAlaCarteTypeChoice

      public void getAlaCarteTypeChoice​(int choice, ChoiceObserver callback)
      Get User's Choice for what an item's type is
      Parameters:
      choice - is an int representing the user's previous choice.
      callback - is the anonymous callback function to run when user inputs a valid integer

    • getName

      public String getName​(boolean isPackage)
      Gets the name of the menu item or package
      Parameters:
      isPackage - is a bool that represents whether an item is a package or ala carte item.
      Returns:
      a string representing the name of the package or ala carte item

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice​(boolean isPackage)
      Get the price of either a package or ala carte item.
      Parameters:
      isPackage - is a bool that represents whether an item is a package or ala carte item.
      Returns:
      a double corresponding to the price of package or ala carte item.

      public void getAlaCarteFieldChoice​(int choice, ChoiceObserver callback)

    • getItemToPackageChoice

      public void getItemToPackageChoice​(int choice, ArrayList<AlaCarteEntity> items, ChoiceObserver callback)
      Add ala carte item to package.
      Parameters:
      choice - is an int that represents the user's previous choice
      items - is an ArrayList of AlaCarteEntity showing the available items to be added to package
      callback - is the anonymous callback function to run when user inputs a valid integer

    • getPackageFieldChoice

      public void getPackageFieldChoice​(int choice, ChoiceObserver callback)

      Parameters:
      choice - is the user's previous choice to update package
      callback - is the anonymous callback function to run when user inputs a valid integer

    • getPackageChoice

      public void getPackageChoice​(int choice, ArrayList<PackageEntity> packages, ChoiceObserver callback)
      Updating/Removing whole package entity
      Parameters:
      choice - is the user's previous decision to either update or remove the package
      packages - is an ArrayList of Package Entity stored in menu
      callback - is the anonymous callback function to run when user inputs a valid integer
